body_html: btw, --march=native doesn't seem to enable all optimizations, so there's some confusion as to what flags need to be set (someone's getting 30% speedup by adding fma/avx/avx2/mpmath flags in addition to march=native) http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41996006/should-i-enable-simd-extensions-together-with-cuda-support-when-building-tensorf)
